SortAlgDemo
Class BarChartPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  SortAlgDemo.BarChartPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class BarChartPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

The BarChartPanel class is a class extending the JPanel class. Its major objective is help to convert the sorted data (Array of Objects) into Graphics form (Bar Chart) which could be displayed in the GUI, such that user could experience the actual data movement with each sorting step.

A private final integer which presets the width of each bar in the bar chart of 5, this value can't be modified.
